exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_switch with (f0 := fun x z => fst (f (x, snd z))) (g := locally (fst z)) (h := l).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : C -> C z, l : C H : filterlim f (locally' z) (locally l) The term "l" has type "(R * R)%type" while it is expected to have type "R -> R_CompleteSpace".

In environment f : C -> C z, l : C H : filterlim f (locally' z) (locally l) X0 : ?T -> (?T -> Prop) -> Prop H0 : forall F1 : (?T1 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F1 -> forall F2 : (?T2 -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F2 -> forall (f0 : ?T1 -> ?T2 -> ?U) (g : ?T2 -> ?U) (h : ?T1 -> ?U), filterlim f0 F1 (locally g) -> (forall x : ?T1, filterlim (f0 x) F2 (locally (h x))) -> exists l0 : ?U, filterlim h F1 (locally l0) /\\ filterlim g F2 (locally l0) X1 : ?A -> ?B -> ?B H1 : ?B0 -> ?A -> ?B -> ?B Unable to unify "filterlim f (locally' z) (locally l)" with "C_lim f z = l".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment f : C -> C z, l : C H : filterlim f (locally' z) (locally l) Unable to unify "(continuity_pt ?M4929 ?M4930 -> filterlim ?M4929 (locally' ?M4930) (locally (?M4929 ?M4930))) /\\ (filterlim ?M4929 (locally' ?M4930) (locally (?M4929 ?M4930)) -> continuity_pt ?M4929 ?M4930)" with "Type".

original: intros f l z H. unfold C_lim in H. apply filterlim_switch with (f0 := fun x z => fst (f (x, snd z))) (g := locally (fst z)) (h := l). - apply H. - intros x. apply continuity_pt_filterlim'.
